reviewText: We are at the 100th anniversary of WW1 and much has been forgotten about the "war to end all wars."  Awarnence of the sacrifices made during WW1 is a way to honor those who participated.

Really loved it. I saw it years ago
Bit have grown to see as the main event of the last 100 years. Love the show on general.
Visits to WWI battle sites provided excellent access and viewing.  Highly recommend this dvd.
Excellent product covers most of the important sights of The Great War.
